to_get_started: Morom pora: suru kuri jabo karne:
please_log_in: Age jabo karne morom pora log in kuribi
login_required: ${app}. use kuribo karne apni kinika hoilebi log in kuribo lagibo.
only_english: Etya to khali English he support kuri ase
to_continue_to_projects: Kaam chalu rakhibo karone, "continue Project te" click koribi
dev_mode_disabled: Unnoti kura mode tu bon hoise
dev_mode_enabled: Unnoti kura mode tu khulise. ${app} unnati mode te ekubi technical diya huwa nai!
no_internet: Sewok te hongjug kuribole napare. Morom pora aapni laga Internet connection tu check kuribi.
using_internet: Aapni etya Internet te data pathabole ashe. Hosa pora aapni itu koribole itcha ashe?
toggle_developer_tools: Unnoti kura jontro khan buttam lagabi
running_latest_version: Aapni ${app} laga sobse nautun anubad cholai ashe.
changing_locale_effects: Bebohar kurya interface laga bhasa bodli kurile menukhan te paa bhasa khan te, dialog Khan te, aru kaam laga sthapankaran khan te prabhab hobo.
changing_locale_note: Jani lobi: bhasa karne aru bhasa anubad kuriya laga oshtro khan te bodli kuribole, morompra pora oshtro chuniya homoi te bibhinno Gateway Language te select kuribi.
feedback_error: Aapni laga jawab tu arpan kuribole napare. Pichete arubi kosish kuribi.
leave_feedback: Amikhan karne aapni laga jawab chari babi!
alignment_prompt: Aapni laga lekha logote milai diya laga data pathabole itcha ashe naki?
include_alignment_check: Milai diya data bi antarbhuk kuribi
find_out_more: Iyate ${app} laga bisay te bishi bisaribi:
based_on_earlier_work: Aage laga ${wycliffe_associates} laga ISC bhitorte pradarshan howa ashe
third_party_attributions: Third Party hongjug lekhi adhikar suchna and agya niomkhan
unknown_networking_error: ${app_name} has encountered an unknown communications error. If this problem continues, please send "${user_feedback}" which is an option on the "${actions}" button.

updates.checking_for_source_content_updates: Source Content laga unnati ke check kuri ashe
updates.failed_checking_for_source_content_updat: Source Content laga unnati check kura tu pura koribole para nai
updates.downloading_source_content_updates: source content unnati tu download kuri ashe...
updates.source_content_updates_successful_downlo: Source content laga unnati tu sampurna download hoise!
updates.source_content_updates_unsuccessful_down: Source content laga unnatikhan download kura tu asafal hoise.
updates.source_content_up_to_date: Sob course content khan adhunik hoise
updates.select_the_gateway_language_content_to_d: Aapni kuba bhasa download kuri kena unnati koribole itcha thakile Gateway Language tu chunibi
updates.update_available:
${app}.
laga ekta nautun anubaad thaki ashe, aapni ${old_version} ke cholai ashe. ${new_version} tu etya uplabdh ase.
updates.checking_for_app: Software unnoti huake check kuri ashe...

users.to_log_out: Log out kuribole karne "log out" click kuribi.
users.please_log_in: Morom pora aapni laga ${door43} logote log in kuribi.
users.no_d43_account: Judi aapni laga ${door43} nai hole, aapni ekta bonai lobole paribo.
users.may_create_d43_account: Judi aapni etya ekta account bonai lobole itcha nai hole, aapni pichete bi aluhi hisapte jari rakhibole paribo.
users.d43_info_1:
${door43} adhikar suchi taka ekta free, online aru talika sanchodhaniya niyantran laga Bible samagri ashe.
pora itu free te diye, durborti bhandar aru Bible talika laga nubad kura bektikhan ke saheyug laga sewa diye.
users.may_be_guest: Aapni aluhi hisabte bi chunibole pare nohole ba aapni chinaki najonaikena rakhibole pare.
users.not_create_d43_account: Etya laga halte ${app} tu ${door43} laga account bonabole sahaita nakure.
users.may_create_d43: Aapni online dwara iyate ekta account bonabole paribo
users.read_and_agree: Ami poriloise aru sob niyom khan ke manilobole sehmat ashe.
users.known_as_username: Aapni nijor ke ${username>} hisabte chinibole karne chuni loise. Itu upyogkarta laga naam tu sobmanu dekhibole paribo.
users.known_not_comfortable: Aapni judi nijor ke ${username}, chinaki hobole itcha nai koile, aapni cancel aru ekta nautun naam halibi.
users.how_to_proceed: Aapni kinika agge jabole itcha ashe?
users.login_error: Login kuribole kosish kura homoite golti hoise.
users.session_invalid: Aapni laga login tu galti olaise. Morom pora log out kurikena wapash login kuribi.
users.by_continuing: Jari rakhikena, aapni pori loishe aru bujise aru sob niomawali khan tu manilobole bharosha kotha dishe:
users.not_infringe: Khali jorra talika, juntu alag manu laga copyright adhikar ulanghan nakure.
users.not_conflict: Bisash laga mantabya logote sangharsh nohobole khali milab laga talika.
users.release_contributions: Aapni laga jugdaan khan tu 'a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International Licence' te hali dibi.

projects.archived:
The project (${project_name}) cannot be uploaded because it has been archived on ${door43}.

To Upload this project, kindly unarchive the project on ${door43} first or rename the project in ${app_name}.
projects.archive_failed: The project could not be archived.
projects.confirm_archive: Archiving this project will remove the project from the project list, but it will continue to store the project on your computer. If you wish to continue, click Archive Project below.
projects.error_setting_up_project: Oops! Aapni laga kaam tu load kuribole amikhan sthapankaran te samasya hoise. Morom pora modot lobo karne Help Desk (${email}) te samparka kuribi.
projects.error_loading: Oops! Aapni laga kaam tu load kuribole amikhan samasya hoise. Morom pora modot lobo karne Help Desk (${email}) te samparka kuribi.
projects.to_export_project: Upload nohole ba kiba ekta kaam niryat kuribole karne nohole ba kaam laga sampurna sudharibo karne click kuribi
projects.supported_projects: USFM kaamkhan aru ${tsudio} kaam khan (anubaad 11 nohole etu pora dangor te bachaikena ashe) samarthan ashe.
projects.no_projects_found: Ekubi kaamkhan paa nai. Kaam aamdani kuriya laga left te diya nirdesh suchi hisab te kuribi
projects.export_wordalignment: Kotha milai diya khan niryat kuribi
projects.books_available: Itu ${aap} anubaad te, translationWordstools khan Nautun Niom laga kaam khan ke samarthan kure aru kotha milai dia laga oshtro khan Purana Niom laga kaam khan ke sampurna Bible hisabte samarthan kure.
projects.supports_any_book: Bible laga jikunu pustak laga kaam te ${app} sahayata kure.
projects.tools_required_resources: Hoilebi, itu kaamkhan tu khali translationWords nohoile ba translationtools te he khulibo judi chunise koile, juntu aapni laga byobastha te ashe. Adhunik unnati ke download kuribo karne "${actions} /${check_for_content_updates}" te click kuribi.
projects.no_search_results: Aapni bisara shreni kunbi kaam logote mila paa nai
projects.importing_project_alert: ${project_url} aamdani hoi ashe. Morom pora rukhibi...
projects.cancel_import_alert: Etya halte rukhaise koile aamdani huwa gati tu bondo hoi jabo aru itu kaamtu bebohar kuribole agete arubi wapash aamdani kuribole lagibo.
projects.project_already_identified: Itu kaam tu ${originalbook} kaam hisabte sinakto hoise. Hosa pora aapni itu ekta ${suggestedbook} te bodni kuribole itcha ashe?
projects.loading_project_alert: Kaam laga data loading hoi ashe.
projects.preparing_project_alert: Project laga data taiyari hoi ashe.
projects.exported_alert: ${project_name} tu ${file_path} te niryat kura tu safal hoise.
projects.must_be_logged_in_alert: Kaam upload kuribole karne aapni ji hoilebi ekta ${door43} account logote log in kuribo lagibo. Morom pora log out kuria pichete ${door43} upoyogkorta laga account logote wapash login kuribi.
projects.uploading_alert: ${project_name} ${door43} te upload kuri ashe. Morom pora rukhibi...
projects.upload_successful_alert: ${username}, aapni laga kaam niryat kura tu sampurna safal hoise.
projects.upload_modified_error: ${project_name} niryat kuribole napare, kilemane aapni laga ${door43} account te thakia aapni laga kaam te bolawat hoi jaise.
projects.merge_export_error: Itu kaam te sangharsha khan ashe aru niryat kuribole napare. Sangharsha khan badlawa kuribole karne kaam tu chunibi, aru wapash kusish koribi.
projects.exporting_file_alert: ${file_name} niryat hoi ashe. Morom pora rukhibi...
projects.project_already_exists: Aapni pora chuniya kaam tu (${project_name}) poila pora thaki ashe.
projects.project_overwrite_no_alignment_message: Itu aapni laga aamdani kaam uporte arubi likhibole itcha thakile "${over_write} te chunibi. Badlawa huwa kotha khan charikena check kuria jiman bi data khan wapash pabo paribo. Itu hal uporte, check kuria tu golti dhora hobo aru wapash nautun kuribo lagibo.
projects.project_overwrite_has_alignment_message: Aamdani kura kaam tu aapni laga milaikena thakia data uporte likhibo, judi sangharsha thakise koile.
projects.no_obs_error: ${aap} tu ${obs} ke bisaribole sahayata nakure. Itu load kura nahobo.
projects.no_tn_error: ${app} pora ${tn} ke bisaribole sahayata nakure. Itu load kura nahobo.
projects.no_tw_error: ${app} pora ${tw} ke bisaribole sahayata nakure. Itu load kura nahobo.
projects.no_tq_error: ${app} pora ${tq} ke bisaribole sahayata nakure. Itu load kura nahobo.
projects.no_manifest_error: ${project_name} prakat kaam pabole napare. Itu load kura nahobo.
projects.not_found:
Aapni laga kaam aamdani kura homoite golti ulaise.
kaam laga file ${project_name} tu ${fromPath} te nai.
projects.not_project_url_error: URL ${project_url} tu thik kaam laga sondarbha nedekhai.
projects.not_usfm_file_error: Aapni pora chuniya project (${project_path} tu golti USFM project ashe.
projects.local_import_error:
Aapni laga project aamdani kura homoite golti ulaise.
${fromPath} pora ${toPath} te project tu loijabole para nai
projects.online_import_error:
Aapni laga project aamdani kura homoite golti ulaise.
${project_url} pora ${toPath} te project download kuribole napara hoise.
projects.fatal_errors: Chetawni! Itu project te hani kuribo para goltikha thaki ashe aru load kuribo napare.
projects.loading_error: amikhan aapni laga project loading kuriate samasya shamna kurishe. Morom pora modot lobo karne Help Desk (${email}) te samparka kuribi.
projects.project_exists: Aapni chuniya project (${project_path} tu poila pora ashe.
projects.reimporting_not_supported: Thakiya project khan aamdani kuria tu etya halte mani noloi.
projects.project_does_not_exist: Project karne aapni chuniya folfer (${project_path}) tu nai.
projects.project_merge_error: Itu project tu aage pora thakia ${project_name} project logote milawat kuria tu golti ulaise.
projects.import_again_as_new_project: Ekta nautun project hisapte morom pora project tu arubi ekbar wapash aamdani kuribi.
projects.renamed_project:
Aapni laga sthaniya project tu
    ${project} naam rakha hoise.
projects.dcs_rename_project:
Aapni laga project tu nautun naam
${project}
rakha hoise. Itu project te ${door43} laga thakia bhandar tu aapni ki kuribole itcha kure?
projects.dcs_rename_success:
${door43} bhandar tu project karne sampurna unnati hoise.
${project}
projects.dcs_rename_failed:
${door43} bhandar ke nautun naam diya huwa nai.

aapni arubi ${door43} bhandar laga nautun naam dibole itcha kore nohoile nautun naam nadikena ene chari dibo?
projects.dcs_create_new_failed:
The ${door43} repository could not be created.

Do you want to retry creating the ${door43} repository or continue without renaming?
projects.dcs_rename_conflict:
Nautun naam diya tu asafal hoise. Kilemane itu naam logote aage pora bhandar ashe.

tu aapni laga project ${door43} te upload kuribole paribo, aapni laga sthaniya project nohoile ${door43} laga naamtu bodli kuribo lagibo.
projects.dcs_create_new_conflict:
Create new repository failed because a repository with this name already exists.

To be able to upload your project to ${door43}, you need to either rename your local project or rename your ${door43} Project.
projects.unknown_download_networking_error:
${app_name} has encountered an unknown communications error trying to download the project from "${project_url}".

If this problem continues, please send "${user_feedback}" which is an option on the "${actions}" button.
projects.project_locked:
The project is locked at:
'${file_path}'. Please Restart your computer and try again.

project_validation.language_mismatch: Code karne bhasha laga naam namile
project_validation.select_copyright: Morom pora itu project karne lekhi adhikar laga sithi tu chunibi.
project_validation.other_license: Kunba project laga lekhi adhikar stithi nohoile sarwajanik domain te kiba alag thakile, CC0, Creative Commons Attribution, nohole Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike.
project_validation.project_information_missing: Kunba project laga jankari harabolebi pare. Morom pora dhyan pora sabi aru sob jarurat field khan bhorta kuribi.
project_validation.publicly_available: Jun yogdan kora bektikhan talika te ashe taikhan ke sarwajanik te uplabdh hobo.
project_validation.invalid_language_name: Bahasa laga naam tu omanya ashe
project_validation.invalid_language_code: Bhasa laga code tu omanya ashe
project_validation.merge_conflicts_found: Aapni laga project bhitorte kunba milawat khan gorbor ulaise. Morom pora dhyan kori kena sabi aru jari koribole agete gorbor khal samadhan kuribi.
project_validation.conflict_reference: Itu ekta chapter ${chapter}, verse ${verse} laga milawati gorbor ashe.
project_validation.missing_verses_instructions: Kunba verse khan appni laga project te haraikena ashe.
project_validation.only_nt_supported: Itu ${app} anubad tu khali Nautun Niom laga project khan ke sahayata kure.
project_validation.old_project_unsupported: Itu project te purana anubad ${app} laga data khan ashe junke itu pradarshan tu sahayata nakure. Itu project tu khulibole modot pabo karne nautun pora suru koribo karne nohole check kuribole karne, morom pora ${help_desk_email}. te samparka kuribi.

resource_id.info:
(3 nohole 4 chinaki
code, E.G. KJV, NIV, etc.)
resource_id.invalid_characters: Khali Latin laga moulik aksar khan he sahayata hoi

project_validation.conflicting_project: Itu bhasa aru pustak karne aage pora ekjon parisayak laga ekta project thaki ashe.
project_validation.newer_project: Itu project tu translationCore laga sabse nautun anubad te bana hoise. Morom pora sobse nautun anubad tu unnati koribi aru wapash koshis koribi.

tools.tN_version_warning:
Opening a project in translationNotes could invalidate some work previously completed on it. Are you sure you want to continue?

The Gateway Language you have chosen to use for translationNotes uses a previous version of the original (Hebrew or Greek) language text. Launching it now may reset some of the checks previously completed in translationWords and/or invalidate some alignments. The checks and alignments that are reset will be marked as incomplete after launching this tool.
tools.resource_missing_for_tool: Etya laga oshtro karne UGNT dusra anubaad lage. Itu sampad tu bachabole karne morom pora Download te click kuribi.
tools.no_checks_selected: Itu oshtro tu cholabole karne aapni jeneka hoilebi ekta shreni chunibole lage
tools.select_tool_from_list: Talika pora ekta oshtro aru ekta gateway language chunibi.
tools.no_tools: Ekubi ${app} default oshtro khan paa nai.
tools.tw_part1_description: Bible laga asol sabda khan thik thak pora bujikena check kuribole karne ekta safa varnana, anubaad karne prastabo laga oshtro.
tools.alignment_description: Anubaad kuria tu kinika Bible laga asol bhasa laga asol matlab jugajug kure itu dikhabole karne ekta sabda milai dia laga oshtro. Itu data tu dusra sampad bonabole karne modot hobo pare jeneke, target bhasa khante concordance khan bonabole, Bible laga interlinear karne.
tools.please_select_gl: Aapni anubaad kuribole itcha kuria bhasa chunibole karne morom pora Gateway Language tu chunibi.
tools.ugnt: Greek laga Nautun Niom tu khulibi
tools.missing_verse_warning: CHETAWNI: itu ullekh kora tu itu Bible anubaad te nai.
tools.no_selection_made: Ekubi chuniya nai. Click kurikena button chunibi, aru anubad tu chunibi.
tools.selections_invalidated: Kunba chuniya khan nathaka hoise aru utu khanke ulai dishe.
tools.make_changes: Firste, uporte thaka verse khan badlawa kuribi
tools.alignments_reset: Etya laga verse te bodlawa hoise juntu aapni milai diya logote digdari di ashe. Itu etya verse laga milaw tu nautun pora sthapan kurishe.
tools.invalidation_checking: Bachaikena rakha milaikena rakha khan logote itu sudhar tu sangharsa kure na nakure check kuri ashe...
tools.alignments_reset_wa_tool: Aapni laga project te badlawa kuri diya hoise aru itu khanke aapni laga sangrekhan te milai diya hoise. Itu verse khan sandarbha laga kinarte ekta bhangiya sikol laga icon te dikhai dibo.
tools.invalid_verse_alignments_and_selections: Aapni laga project te badlawa huwa paise ju khanke aapni laga kunba sangrekhan te milai diya hoise. Itu verse khan kinar laga menu te sandarbha laga pichete ekta bhangiya sikol laga icon te dikhai dibo.
tools.invalid_check_found: Itu check: ${report} karne olop samasya ashe. Itu samasya tu thik kuribole karne aapni jonai dibole itcha ashe?

buttons.rename_local: Sthaniya project ke nautun naam dibi

tool_card_categories.guidelines-sonofgodprinciples: Baba aru chokra ke anubaad kura.
tool_card_categories.translate-textvariants: Alag prakar laga lekhi sabda khan
tool_card_categories.translate-transliterate: Udhar nohole dhar kura sabda khan
tool_card_categories.figs-apostrophe: Punctuation "apostrophe" tu junhe "laga" motlob ulabole diye
tool_card_categories.figs-metonymy: Metonymy, ekta naam nohoile saman dwara baki sobke chinibole parya laga sabda
tool_card_categories.figs-ellipsis: Ellipsis, kiba khotom nohuwa laga dagi
tool_card_categories.figs-doublet: Bottum, dui bhag tu jora lagai dia gathi
tool_card_categories.figs-explicit: Bhabi lowa gyan aru sampurna jankari
tool_card_categories.writing-participants: Nautun aru purana yogdankari khan laga aag kotha
tool_card_categories.writing-quotations: Ukti khan aru ukti laga sima khan
tool_card_categories.figs-quotesinquotes: Ukti khan laga bhitorte ukti khan
tool_card_categories.figs-gendernotations: Jetiya purlinga sabda khan maiki khan jug kore
tool_card_categories.figs-distinguish: Parthokya biporitte jankari diya nohole yadgari korai diya
